name: DFDS Seaways Commodore Class Cabin
descr:
Commodore Class

Cabins in luxurious Commodore Class with hotel standard and accommodates up to 2 persons. All cabins have private toilet and bath. Commodore breakfast buffet awaits in the restaurant in the morning when itÂ´s a little more intimate than the main buffet.

Large windows with sea views
double Bed
Linens and towels
Bathroom with shower and toilet
hairdryer
TV
Small table and chairs
spring water
1/4 fl. sparkling wine per. person on the outward journey
Room Service
Commodore breakfast buffet

Note Cabin Ternes size, appearance and decor are different from ship to ship. This photo is from PEARL SEAWAYS
